mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_id, user_name, password, email, nickname, hint_question, hint_answer) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{hintQuestion}, #{hintAnswer})
mapper.select: select * from users where user_id = #{userId} and password = #{password}

SELECT al.album_image, s.song_id, s.album_id, s.title, ar.artist_id, ar.artist_name, al.album_name FROM likes l JOIN songs s ON l.song_id = s.song_id JOIN albums al ON s.album_id = al.album_id JOIN artist_roles arr ON s.song_id = arr.song_id JOIN artists ar ON arr.artist_id = ar.artist_id WHERE l.id = #{id} ORDER BY s.title

select user_id, email, hint_question, hint_answer from users where user_id = #{userId} and email = #{email} and (hint_question = #{hintQuestion} or (hint_question is null and #{hintQuestion} = 'null')) and (hint_answer = #{hintAnswer} or (hint_answer is null and #{hintAnswer} = 'null'))
mapper.update: update users set password = #{password}, email = #{email}, nickname = #{nickname}, user_profile = #{userProfile}, hint_question = #{hintQuestion}, hint_answer = #{hintAnswer} where user_id = #{userId}
